argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | poslubdg.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 2 |  | poslubdg.b | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 3 |  | poslubdg.u | |- ( ph -> U = ( lub ` K ) ) |
| 4 |  | poslubdg.k | |- ( ph -> K e. Poset ) |
| 5 |  | poslubdg.s | |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) |
| 6 |  | poslubdg.t | |- ( ph -> T e. B ) |
| 7 |  | poslubdg.ub | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> x .<_ T ) |
| 8 |  | poslubdg.le | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B /\ A. x e. S x .<_ y ) -> T .<_ y ) |
| 9 | 3 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( U ` S ) = ( ( lub ` K ) ` S ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lub ` K ) = ( lub ` K ) |
| 12 | 5, 2 | #P_sseqtrd | |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 2 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ph -> T e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 14 | 2 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( y e. B <-> y e. ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_biimpar | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> y e. B ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. ( Base ` K ) /\ A. x e. S x .<_ y ) -> y e. B ) |
| 17 | 16, 8 | #P_syld3an2 | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. ( Base ` K ) /\ A. x e. S x .<_ y ) -> T .<_ y ) |
| 18 | 1, 10, 11, 4, 12, 13, 7, 17 | #P_poslubd | |- ( ph -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` S ) = T ) |
| 19 | 9, 18 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( U ` S ) = T ) |
